about_the_game:
Fight solo or team up with friends in this action-packed magic fighting game! Utilize your magic skills to level up and earn diamonds and shards, which can be discovered throughout the map or purchased from the in-game shop. Select and master any new element of your choosing!

PLEASE NOTE THIS IS AN INDIE GAME. THE MAIN DEVELOPMENT IS SPEARHEADED BY ONE PERSON

STARTER ELEMENTS:

FIRE
Harness the might of fire with your fiery abilities. As a fire specialist, you can summon fireballs to ride into battle, or ignite yourself for powerful buffs!
WATER
Harness the power of water with your mastery of the element. As a water specialist, you have the ability to create a rideable puddle or unleash a devastating water dragon that deals AOE damage to your foes!
GRASS
Harness the power of nature with your grass skills. As a grass specialist, you can fire thorns that will heal you, or summon a tornado fueled by plants to vanquish your enemies!

VAST OPEN WORLD

Participate in the all-new elemental combat simulator, discover hidden areas of the map and earn limited-time rewards such as founder spells!

CREATIVE COMBAT

Using the all new Unreal Engine 5, we have created completely new element fighting mechanics where you can guide spells with your cursor!

2-20 PLAYER GAMEPLAY

Fight solo or team up with your friends, host games, and create private battles for rewards!

Join the community discord to receive more frequent updates for the game (link below)

Controls PC: Double-tap WASD to do flips, Ctrl/Cmd to sprint, Q to punch, R to block.
